column5: Before I go and do a bunch of research I was curious to know if anyone knew of Ontario lodges that had rental boats with consoles instead of tillers. (Lake of the Woods, Eagle, Lac Seul, Rainy, etc) I have some buddies that just do not like tillers so looking to see if other options exist. Thanks
Witch Bay Camp offers both tiller and console. Pretty remote area of Lake of the Woods.
TOMAHAWK RESORT out of Sioux Narrows offers those options..

Pinecliff Lodge has console boats only with 50 hp. Only lodge on lake and only 2 virtually unused private cottages on the lake. For some, the drawback is no walleyes. Great Small Mouth and Northern lake. Not too big, very easy to learn. I have been there several times and enjoyed every trip. Good luck wherever you go. Tx. Jig Tyr
Terry at Morson Marina on Lake of the Woods has one or two nicer boat rentals. I believe 90hp deep v trackers. http://www.wildernesshouseboats.com/
